page.title: 14Organisations 2
page.content:
Women's Institute and Merched Y Wawr. Both organisations are for women.They hold similar types of lectures and discussions on topics of interest to women eg:- cookery, floral art, travel and handicrafts.Also visits to places of interest.Womens Institute hold their meetings in English and Merched Y Wawr in Welsh.(They also provide an annual supper and entertain the Old Age Pensioners)
4_5 Educational Lectures in school,during the evening (winter months only).
6 Amenities Committee. Arrange whist drives,concerts,film shows,during winter months.They also organise rounders and netball for young people during the summer _also outings ie:-visits to ice rink.
